title: BRIEF-Ramsay Health Care Says Paul Ramsay Holdings To Sell 22 Mln Shares Of Co
text:
BRIEF-Ramsay Health Care Says Paul Ramsay Holdings To Sell 22 Mln Shares Of Co

Stock Markets 59 minutes ago (Sep 16, 2019 18:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Ramsay Health Care Says Paul Ramsay Holdings To Sell 22 Mln Shares Of Co Sept 16 (Reuters) - Ramsay Health Care Ltd : * PAUL RAMSAY ENTERED BLOCK TRADE AGREEMENT WITH TWO FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS TO SELL 22 MILLION ORDINARY SHARES IN CAPITAL OF CO * FOLLOWING SALE, PAUL RAMSAY HOLDINGS PTY LIMITED WILL HOLD APPROXIMATELY 21% OF ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL OF CO

BRIEF-Ramsay Health Care Says Paul Ramsay Holdings To Sell 22 Mln Shares Of Co
description: BRIEF-Ramsay Health Care Says Paul Ramsay Holdings To Sell 22 Mln Shares Of Co
